text: CNN team witnesses multiple explosions in Venezuela’s capital Caracas - CNN

text: Is Trump taking too much aspirin? Here's what experts say - NPR
fullText: Trump takes four times the recommended dose of aspirin for cardiac prevention. Even low-dose aspirin is no longer recommended for people over 60 who don't have heart disease.

text: 9 Minnesota child care centers discussed in viral video "operating as expected," state officials say - CBS News
fullText: Nine of the Minnesota child care centers that were discussed in a viral video, prompting allegations of fraud, were "operating as expected" when state investigators conducted on-site checks this week, officials said on Friday.
